alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 2:50PM MST until February 26 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult overnight, particularly along I-15 through Black Ridge Canyon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect a burst of heavy snow overnight, likely exceeding one inch per hour rates.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
